titles.title: Jesus My Lord My God My All (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus my Lord I Thee adore O make me love Thee More and more{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus my Lord my God my all Hear me blest Saviour when I call Hear me and from Thy dwelling place Pour down the riches of Thy grace{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus too late I Thee have sought How can I love Thee as I ought And how extol Thy matchless frame The glorious beauty of Thy name{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus what didst Thou find in me That Thou hast dealt so lovingly How great the joy that Thou hast brought So far exceeding hope or thought Jesus of Thee shall be my song To Thee my heart and soul belong All that I have or am is Thine And Thou blest Saviour Thou art mine{/lang-eng}
